issue.title: [Python] Update manylinux dependency versions
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5650](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5650). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should bump the versions of upstream libraries we compile in the manylinux build image.

comments.body:
